job.title: Data / Data Lake Engineer
job.description:
Required Experience
Infrastructure on the data side experience
Software design, Data Exposure
Data lake build experience
Load capacity testing
Data Lake environments
Make best practice decisions on use of best Data practices such as (NoSQL/MySQL), streaming media/Not streaming media. Need resource to help give them the structure we need
Apache Spark
SQL
Mongo DB
Speak to configuration of environments (Best use for Builds- from and architectural perspective)
Nice to Haves
Delta Lake
